title.narrative: EVAC AND DI PREVENTION AND RESPONSE SERVICES

description.narrative: The capacities of central and local authorities to plan, regulate, resource and oversee child protection prevention and response services are increased for addressing institutionalization and violence against children., which contributes to Access To Justice, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Girls and boys, especially the most vulnerable, are protected from all forms of violence, abuse, neglect and abject poverty and increasingly utilize quality, integrated social protection services, and parents and caregivers change their attitudes and behaviours on violence against children.

participating-org.narrative: KAZAKH NATIONAL UNIVERSITY NAMED AF AL FARABI
TRUSTEES OF COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY IN THE CITY OF NEW YORK

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
